sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import { Car, MapPin, User, Calendar, DollarSign, Clock, AlertTriangle, ArrowLeft, CheckCircle, XCircle, } from "lucide-react" import api from "../services/api" const RideDetails = () => { const { rideId } = useParams() const [ride, setRide] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [rider, setRider] = useState(null) const [driver, setDriver] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { fetchRideDetails() }, [rideId]) const fetchRideDetails = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const rideResponse = await api.fetchRideDetails(rideId) setRide(rideResponse) // Fetch rider details if (rideResponse.data.riderId) { try { const riderResponse = await api.fetchUserDetails(rideResponse.data.riderId) setRider(riderResponse) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching rider details:", error) } } // Fetch driver details if (rideResponse.data.driverId) { try { const driverResponse = await api.fetchDriverDetails(rideResponse.data.driverId) setDriver(driverResponse) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching driver details:", error) } } } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching ride details:", error) toast.error("Failed to load ride details") } finally { setLoading(false) } } const getStatusBadgeClass = (status) => { switch (status) { case "completed": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" case "cancelled": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800" case "in-progress": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800" case "driver-assigned": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" case "driver-arrived": return "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800" case "pending": return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } if (loading) { return (
) } if (!ride) { return (

Ride not found

The ride you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

Back to Rides
) } return (
Back to Rides
{/* Ride Header */}

Ride #{ride._id.substring(0, 8)}

{ride.status} {new Date(ride.createdAt).toLocaleString()}
{ride.status === "completed" ? (
Completed
) : ride.status === "cancelled" ? (
Cancelled
) : (
{ride.status.replace(/-/g, " ")}
)}
{/* Ride Details */}
{/* Route Information */}

Route Information

Pickup Location

{ride.pickupLocation?.address || "Not specified"}

{ride.pickupLocation?.geo?.coordinates && (

Coordinates: {ride.pickupLocation.geo.coordinates[1]}, {ride.pickupLocation.geo.coordinates[0]}

)}

Dropoff Location

{ride.dropoffLocation?.address || "Not specified"}

{ride.dropoffLocation?.geo?.coordinates && (

Coordinates: {ride.dropoffLocation.geo.coordinates[1]}, {ride.dropoffLocation.geo.coordinates[0]}

)}

Ride Duration

{ride.completedAt && ride.startedAt ? `${Math.round((new Date(ride.completedAt) - new Date(ride.startedAt)) / 60000)} minutes` : "Not completed"}

Vehicle Type

{ride.preferences?.vehicleType || ride.vehicleDetails?.type || "Not specified"}

{/* User Information */}

User Information

Rider

{rider ? (
{rider.name || "Unknown"}

ID: {rider._id}

Phone: {rider.phone || "N/A"}

) : (
View Rider (ID: {ride.riderId?.substring(0, 8)}...)
)}

Driver

{driver ? (
{driver.name || "Unknown"}

ID: {driver._id}

Phone: {driver.phone || "N/A"}

) : ride.driverId ? (
View Driver (ID: {ride.driverId?.substring(0, 8)}...)
) : (

No driver assigned

)}
{ride.vehicleDetails && (

Vehicle Details

{ride.vehicleDetails.color} {ride.vehicleDetails.make} {ride.vehicleDetails.model}

License Plate: {ride.vehicleDetails.licensePlate}

)}
{/* Payment Information */}

Payment Information

Fare

{ride.fare?.amount ? `${ride.fare.amount} ${ride.fare.currency}` : "Not available"}

Payment Method

{ride.paymentMethod || "Not specified"}

Payment Status

{ride.paymentStatus || (ride.status === "completed" ? "Paid" : "Pending")}

{ride.paymentId && (

Payment ID

{ride.paymentId}

)}
{/* Ride Timeline */}

Ride Timeline

  • Ride requested

    {new Date(ride.createdAt).toLocaleString()}
    • {ride.driverId && (

  • Driver assigned

    {ride.driverAssignedAt ? new Date(ride.driverAssignedAt).toLocaleString() : "N/A"}
    • )} {ride.status === "driver-arrived" || ride.status === "in-progress" || ride.status === "completed" ? (

  • Driver arrived at pickup

    {ride.driverArrivedAt ? new Date(ride.driverArrivedAt).toLocaleString() : "N/A"}
    • ) : null} {ride.status === "in-progress" || ride.status === "completed" ? (

  • Ride started

    {ride.startedAt ? new Date(ride.startedAt).toLocaleString() : "N/A"}
    • ) : null} {ride.status === "completed" ? (

  • Ride completed

    {ride.completedAt ? new Date(ride.completedAt).toLocaleString() : "N/A"}
    • ) : ride.status === "cancelled" ? (

  • Ride cancelled {ride.cancelledBy ? `by ${ride.cancelledBy}` : ""}

    {ride.cancellationReason && (

    Reason: {ride.cancellationReason}

    )}
    {ride.cancelledAt ? new Date(ride.cancelledAt).toLocaleString() : "N/A"}
    • ) : null}
) } export default RideDetails
